import React, { useState } from 'react' import styled from 'styled-components' import { Card, CardHeader, CardBody, Text, Button, Link, Flex, ExpandableLabel, ArrowDownIcon, ErrorIcon, OpenNewIcon, } from '@blzd-dev/uikitikit' const otherProjects = [ { label: 'ACryptoS', href: 'https://app.acryptos.com/', }, { label: 'Autofarm', href: 'https://autofarm.network/', }, { label: 'Alpha Homora', href: 'https://homora-bsc.alphafinance.io/', }, { label: 'Alpaca Finance', href: 'https://app.alpacafinance.org/', }, { label: 'Beefy', href: 'https://app.beefy.finance/', }, { label: 'bEARN', href: 'https://bearn.fi/', }, { label: 'Cream Finance', href: 'https://app.cream.finance/', }, { label: 'Harvest', href: 'https://harvest.finance/', }, { label: 'JetFuel', href: 'https://jetfuel.finance/vaults', }, { label: 'PancakeBunny', href: 'https://pancakebunny.finance/', }, { label: 'ValueDeFi', href: 'https://bsc.valuedefi.io/#/', }, ] const FoldableContent = styled(CardBody)<{ isVisible: boolean }>` display: ${({ isVisible }) => (isVisible ? 'block' : 'none')}; ` const FirstCard = () => { const [isVisible, setIsVisible] = useState(false) return ( Move LP tokens to wallet Unstake your old LP tokens from farms and other projects. Unstake LP tokens from old Farms All farms will gradually switch to new farms, one-by-one. You can wait until farms switch over, or you can unstake in advance. You DON’T need to unstake from Syrup Pools. Unstake from other projects Suggested projects setIsVisible((prev) => !prev)}> {isVisible ? 'Hide' : 'Details'} You may need to unstake any PancakeSwap LP Tokens that you’ve staked in yield aggregators or other projects. Here are some projects you might be using:
    {otherProjects.map((project) => (
  • {project.label}
    • ))}
Please follow your chosen project’s social media and community to find out how they will handle the migration, and what you need to do. You can also easily check the location of your LP tokens via Yieldwatch: ) } export default FirstCard
